content: Patient ID 8824-5567H (Marguerite Villeneuve, DOB 06/12/1963) underwent three spinal injections at Alpine Pain Clinic between May-August 2024. Claim denied due to missing treatment justification documents. Clinic coordinator Darnell Watkins (darnell.w@alpinepain.co, 303-555-0184) appealed with operative notes showing radicular symptoms.
